    download_data() and NASA EarthData Account Downloading EPA Daily Data

Function reference

All functions

as_mysftime()
Convert to sftime object on the form adapted to beethoven code
calc_covariates()
Calculate covariates
calc_ecoregion()
Calculate EPA Ecoregions level 2/3 binary variables
calc_geos()
Calculate NASA GEOS-CF meteorological and atmospheric covariates
calc_gmted()
Calculate GMTED elevation covariates
calc_hms()
Calculate NOAA HMS Wildfire Smoke covariates
calc_koppen_geiger()
Calculate Koeppen-Geiger climate zone binary variables
calc_modis_daily()
A single-date MODIS worker for parallelization
calc_modis_par()
Calculate MODIS product covariates in multiple CPU threads
calc_narr()
Calculate NOAA NCEP North American Regional Reanalysis meteorological and atmospheric covariates
calc_nei()
Calculate National Emission Inventory (NEI) covariates
calc_nlcd_ratio()
Compute land cover classes ratio in circle buffers around points
calc_sedac_groads()
Calculate SEDAC groads density covariates
calc_sedac_population()
Calculate UN WPP-Ajusted population density covariates
calc_sedc()
Calculate Sum of Exponentially Decaying Contributions (SEDC) covariates
calc_temporal_dummies()
Calculate temporal dummy variables
calc_tri()
Calculate TRI covariates
check_for_null_parameters()
Check for null arguments
check_mysf()
Check if the sf object is formated on a specific way
check_mysftime()
Check if the sftime object is formated on a specific way
check_url_status()
Check if sample of download URLs have HTTP Status 200
check_urls()
Sample download URLs and apply check_url_status function
convert_stdt()
Convert a stdt to sf/sftime/SpatVector
convert_stdt_sftime()
Convert a stdtobj to sftime
convert_stdt_spatrastdataset()
Convert a stdtobj to SpatRasterDataset
convert_stdt_spatvect()
Convert a stdt to SpatVector
convert_stobj_to_stdt()
Convert spatio-temporal object to a datatable with lon, lat, time, predictors columns.
download_aqs_data()
Download daily data from AQS datamart
download_data()
Download raw data from sources
download_ecoregion_data()
Download Ecoregion Shapefiles from EPA
download_epa_certificate()
Check EPA Certificate
download_geos_cf_data()
Download atmospheric composition data from the NASA Global Earth Observing System (GEOS) model.
download_gmted_data()
Download global elevation data from the Global Multi-resolution Terrain Elevation Data (GMTED2010).
download_hms_data()
Download daily wildfire smoke plume data from NOAA Hazard Mapping System Fire and Smoke Product
download_koppen_geiger_data()
Download climate classification data from the present and future KÃ¶ppen-Geiger climate classification maps.
download_merra2_data()
Download meteorological and atmospheric data from the Modern-Era Retrospective analysis for Research and Applications, Version 2 (MERRA-2) model.
download_modis_data()
Download MODIS product files
download_narr_monolevel_data()
download_narr_monolevel_data: download monolevel meteorological data from NOAA NCEP North American Regional Reanalysis (NARR) model.
download_narr_p_levels_data()
Download pressure level meteorological data from NOAA NCEP North American Regional Reanalysis (NARR) model.
download_nei_data()
Download data from EPA National Emission Inventory aggregated on-road emission data
download_nlcd_data()
Download land cover data from the National Land Cover Database Science Research Products.
download_permit()
Check for data download acknowledgement
download_remove_command()
Remove or keep wget command file
download_remove_zips()
Remove downloaded zip files
download_run()
download_run: execute or skip system_command in data download function.
download_sanitize_path()
Sanitize path to end with a forward slash
download_sedac_groads_data()
Download Global Roads Open Access Data Set (gROADS), v1 (1980-2010) data from NASA Socioeconomic Data and Applications Center (SEDAC).
download_sedac_population_data()
Download UN WPP-Adjusted population density data from NASA Socioeconomic Data and Applications Center (SEDAC)
download_setup_dir()
Check if input directory exists
download_sink()
Start sink download commands into a text file
download_tri_data()
Download data from EPA toxic release inventory
download_unzip()
Unzip downloaded data
dt_as_mysftime()
Create a sftime from a datatable
dt_as_sf()
Create a sf object from a data.table
dt_as_sftime()
Create a sftime object from a data.table
extract_urls()
Extract URLs from download commands
generate_date_sequence()
Generate sequence of dates based on date_start and date_end.
generate_time_sequence()
Generate time sequence based on GEOS-CF data collection.
is_date_proper()
Check input strings conform to the required format
is_stdt()
Boolean to know if an object correspond to a stdtobj
process_aqs()
Filter unique AQS sites with or without temporal information
process_bluemarble()
Assign VIIRS Blue Marble products corner coordinates to retrieve a merged raster
process_bluemarble_corners()
Tile corner generator for Blue Marble products
process_conformity()
Check input assumptions
process_covariates()
Process covariates
process_ecoregion()
Process EPA Ecoregion shapefiles
process_flatten_sds()
Aggregate layers in a sub-dataset in sinusoidal MODIS products
process_geos()
Import and clean GEOS-CF data downloaded with download_geos_cf_data or download_data(dataset_name = "geos"). Function returns a SpatRast object containing the user-defined variables of interest. Layer names indicate the variable, pressure level, date (YYYYMMDD), and, if applicable, the hour (HHMMSS).
process_geos_collection()
Identify GEOS-CF collection based on user-defined file paths
process_gmted()
Import and clean Global Multi-resolution Terrain Elevation Data (GMTED2010) downloaded with download_gmted or download_data(dataset_name = "gmted"). Function returns a SpatRast object containing the user-defined variable of interest at specified resolution. Layer name indicates variable and resolution.
process_gmted_codes()
Generate statistic and resolution codes based on GMTED statistic and resolution.
process_hms()
Import and clean wildfire smoke plume coverage data from NOAA Hazard Mapping System Fire and Smoke Product.
process_koppen_geiger()
Process Koeppen-Geiger climate data
process_locs_radius()
Create circular buffer around site points.
process_locs_vector()
Import and prepare site point locations for covariate calculations.
process_modis_merge()
Get mosaicked or merged raster from multiple MODIS hdf files
process_modis_sds()
Selected MODIS sinusoidal grid product subdataset name selector
process_modis_swath()
Mosaic MODIS swaths
process_modis_warp()
Warp MODIS swath data into rectilinear grid raster
process_narr()
Import and clean NOAA NCEP North American Regional Reanalysis (NARR) data downloaded with download_narr or download_data(dataset_name = "NARR"). Function returns a SpatRast object containing the user-defined variable of interest. Layer names indicate the variable, pressure level, and date (YYYYMMDD).
process_nei()
Prepare National Emission Inventory CSV files
process_nlcd()
Process raw National Landuse Classification Dataset
process_sedac_codes()
Generate resolution codes based on NASA SEDAC population resolution.
process_sedac_groads()
Import and clean groads data from NASA Socioeconomic Data and Applications Center (SEDAC).
process_sedac_population()
Import and clean population data from NASA Socioeconomic Data and Applications Center (SEDAC).
process_tri()
Prepare Toxic Release Inventory (TRI) data
project_dt()
Project coordinates in a datatable from crs_ori to crs_dest
read_commands()
Read commands and convert to character vector
rename_time()
Rename the time column of a sftime object
sf_as_mysftime()
Convert a sf object to mysftime
sftime_as_mysftime()
Convert a sftime object to mysftime
sftime_as_sf()
Simplify an sftime to sf class
sftime_as_spatraster()
Convert sftime object to SpatRaster /!\ can be very time consuming if sftime is not spatially structured
sftime_as_spatrds()
Convert sftime object to SpatVectorDataset /!\ running time can be very long if x is not spatially and temporally structured
sftime_as_spatvector()
Convert sftime object to SpatVector
spatraster_as_sftime()
Create a sftime from a terra::SpatRaster
spatrds_as_sftime()
Create a sftime from a terra::SpatRasterDataset
spatvector_as_sftime()
Create a sftime from a terra::SpatVector
test_download_functions()
Apply download function-specific unit tests
